title: Awakening Dragon: A Shamanic Adventure
description: Awakening Dragon is about empowerment, stirring the magick that lies at your heart, and through your heart, at the heart of the universe.It is an introspective journey through the depths of the subconscious, through the essence of thought and emotion, through archetypes and the laws of existence, and into the dynamic flow of energy and awareness that underlies everything in the universe, everything in the wakeaday, and everything in the underworld. It is a story about finding yourself, finding your center, and finding the love and intent that is at the heart of everything.
author: P.D.  Allen
